channel.title: [pi] dds spec glitch
channel.description:
im on a pi base
and for some reason if you dds spec, then change to another weapon like a godsword real fast, then it specs with that weapon...
like if you dds specd and switched to godsword, it would just do dds spec except with the str bonus of a godsword so you can hit like 50-50 or so...
how can i fix this?

item.title: [pi] dds spec glitch
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
